description: Includes the datasets simulated by O'Reilly et al. (2016) <doi:10.1111/pala.12236>, and analyes of their partition and quartet distance from the generative tree, as analysed by Smith (2019).
title: Distance metrics for trees generated by O'Reilly et al. 2016

creators.affiliation: Department of Earth Sciences, Durham University
creators.name: Martin R. Smith
